characterDescription: Puuli's grandfather had warned of the time of changes, when the men from the hidden island of the Origin at last came to reclaim Natanatan.

characterDetails.Characteristics:
His grandfather had been able to remember when the cliffs at the little port on the crumbling eastern edge of Roshar where Puuli resides should've sheltered homes to their west.
He was powerful and enduring, like all the members of Puuli's family.
characterDetails.Notes: *Puuli believes that this was now, with a new storm. Darkest nights. A tragedy. And a sign.
